entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Follow-up on updating maintenance-packages dependencies conditioned to only DotNetBuildSourceOnly != true #45155
  • Color on Watch Run #45161
  • GlobalAnalyzerConfig broke with potential ordering change in .net 9 and no documentation tells you how to fix it #45150
  • Test CheckTargetFrameworkDisplayName often fails in CI #45148
  • LDAP server channel binding in System.DirectoryServices.Protocols #45136
  • How to build dotnet SDK? #45135
  • ILLInk fix the usage of treatWarningsAsErrors #45134

PullRequests

Created

  • Try to fix win-x86 windowsdesktop builds #45162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search version #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [VMR] Add verticals for Linux/Windows NativeAOT runtime packs #45154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Better search versions error experience #45144
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45095
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Improve error experience for Restore command without a project #45129
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add option to include/exclude previews to workload search version command Fixes #43890 #45149
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • randomize GetTestDestinationDirectoryPath #45130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implicit reference to `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets` #44997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fail in case of hybrid projects (new testing platform and vstest) in dotnet test #45133
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #45118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #45119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add accidentally removed JS functions back #45124
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #45120
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2590204 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: CLI Help missing package description #44954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-Templates
  • Re-enable scenario-tests execution in VMR #45109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use arcade infra for DEB and RPM build #45047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Remove manual home variable lookup #44266
    Review for breaking changes, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Factor Hot Reload agent implementation into a source package #44899
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • upgraded logging for #595 log url when connection is closed #44953
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45096
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch
